Name: Touchwood
Ingredients: 45 ml Lowland single malt scotch whisky
10 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: RINSE chilled glass with vermouth and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into rinsed glass.
Review: Stirred down and boozy, this Lowland single malt-based cocktail is sweetened and made very approachable by Pedro Ximénez sherry , and awakened by a pinch of cracked black pepper. A great late-night sipper.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2016 by Matthew Follent at Bar 1806 , Melbourne, Australia, this was one of the drinks that contributed to his winning The Perfect Blend 2016 competition. His original recipe stipulates Auchentoshan Three Wood as the Lowland single malt.
